description:
Chiba Mamoru is an university student who live in the same town as Usagi. They hate each other initially but later become lovers.
Chiba Mamoru is the reincarnation of http://anidb.net/ch9313 [Prince Endymion] and the civilian identity of http://anidb.net/ch7375 [Tuxedo Kamen]. In the 30th century, he will be known as http://anidb.net/ch7487 [King Endymion].
name: Chiba Mamoru
